languages.text: "Я лично пристрелю этого мерзавца, когда доберусь до него!"

traits.locale_text: "Я лично пристрелю этого мерзавца, когда доберусь до него!"

languages.text: "I'll personally shoot that scum when I catch up with him!"
languages.original_text: "Я лично пристрелю этого мерзавца, когда доберусь до него!"

traits.locale_text: "I'll personally shoot this scum when I'll get to him!"
"I'll personally shoot this scum when I'll get to him!"
"I'll personally shoot that scum when I catch up with him!"
"I'll personally shoot that scum when I catch up with him!"
"I'll personally shoot that scum when I catch up with him!"

languages.text: “别让我追上他，否则我会亲自朝那个人渣开火！”
languages.original_text: "I'll personally shoot that scum when I catch up with him!"

traits.locale_text: “别让我追上他，否则我会亲自朝那个人渣开火！”

languages.text: «¡Dispararé personalmente a ese desgraciado en cuanto lo encuentre!».
languages.original_text: "I'll personally shoot that scum when I catch up with him!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Dispararé personalmente a ese desgraciado en cuanto lo encuentre!».

languages.text: "Ich werde diesen Mistkerl persönlich erschießen, wenn ich ihn erwische!"
languages.original_text: "I'll personally shoot that scum when I catch up with him!"

traits.locale_text: "I'll personally shoot that scum when I catch up with him!"

languages.text: « J'abattrai personnellement ce rat dès que je l'aurai rattrapé ! »
languages.original_text: "I'll personally shoot that scum when I catch up with him!"

traits.locale_text: « J'abattrai personnellement ce rat dès que je l'aurai rattrapé ! »

languages.text: 「あのクズ、追いついたら直々に手を下してくれる！」
languages.original_text: "I'll personally shoot that scum when I catch up with him!"

traits.locale_text: 「あのクズ、追いついたら直々に手を下してくれる！」

languages.text: "O alçağa bir yetişeyim, kendi elimle vuracağım!"
languages.original_text: "I'll personally shoot that scum when I catch up with him!"
